column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I have gone to Lou Malnati's for their delicious deep dish pizza each of the two times I have visited Chicago. During both of my trips
column2: I tried various other deep dish pizzas (Giordano's
column5: and I have to admit that Lou Malnati's has my favorite all-around deep dish pizza. They win be over with their delicious Buttercrust and perfect combination of cheese
column7: and tomato sauce in their Malnati Chicago Classic deep dish pizza. Their trio of dips and pizza chips is a great starter if you're into hummus and artichoke-type dips.
